# PKDeferredPaymentSummaryItem

**Class**

An object that defines a summary item for a payment that occurs at a later date, such as a pre-order.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKDeferredPaymentSummaryItem
```

## Setting the payment date

- **deferredDate**: The date, in the future, of the payment.

## Setting payment summary items

- **deferredBilling**: An object that contains details about the deferred payment.

## Inherits From

- PKPaymentSummaryItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: The date, in the future, of the payment.
items.name: deferredDate

items.description: An object that contains details about the deferred payment.
items.name: deferredBilling
